00012 /*!\fn int gfx_status( int ACTION , int value )
00013  *\brief status of opengl & or directx
00014  *\param ACTION set it to GET or SET
00015  *\param value if action is set to SET, then status take the value 'value' else nothing is done with 'value'
00016  *\return the gfx_status, MODE_OGL or MODE_DX
00017  */
00018 int gfx_status( int ACTION , int value )
00019 {
00020 
00021    static int STATUS = MODE_DX;
00022 
00023    if ( ACTION == SET ) {
00024       if ( value == MODE_DX )
00025          STATUS = MODE_DX;
00026 
00027       if ( value == MODE_OGL )
00028          STATUS = MODE_OGL;
00029    }
00030    return STATUS;
00031 } /* gfx_status(...) */

00113 /*!\fn Force32BitBmpToAlpha( BITMAP *bmp )
00114  *\brief Force if already not a 32bpp bmp to be the same with an alpha channel
00115  *\param bmp the bitmap to check
00116  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00117  */
00118 int Force32BitBmpToAlpha( BITMAP *bmp )
00119 {
00120    int x, y;
00121    int r, g, b, alpha;
00122    int col, mask;
00123 
00124    __n_assert( bmp , return FALSE );
00125 
00126    acquire_bitmap( bmp );
00127    mask = bitmap_mask_color( bmp );
00128 
00129    /* First check if an alpha channel already exists */
00130    for ( y = 0; y < bmp->h; ++y ) {
00131       for ( x = 0; x < bmp->w; ++x ) {
00132          col = getpixel( bmp, x, y );
00133          alpha = geta( col );
00134 
00135          if ( alpha != 0 && col != mask ) {
00136             release_bitmap( bmp );
00137             return FALSE;
00138          }
00139       }
00140    }
00141 
00142    for ( y = 0; y < bmp->h; ++y ) {
00143       for ( x = 0; x < bmp->w; ++x ) {
00144          col = getpixel( bmp, x, y );
00145          r = getr( col );
00146          g = getg( col );
00147          b = getb( col );
00148          putpixel( bmp, x, y, makeacol( r, g, b, 255 ) );
00149       }
00150    }
00151    release_bitmap( bmp );
00152    return TRUE ;
00153 } /* Force32BitBmpToAlpha */

00157 /*!\fn force_color_to_be( BITMAP *bmp , int oldcolor , int newcolor )
00158  *\brief Change all the bmp pixel of the same color src to color dst
00159  *\param bmp the bitmap where the effect take place
00160  *\param oldcolor the color to change
00161  *\param newcolor the new color of oldcolor ;)
00162  */
00163 void force_color_to_be( BITMAP *bmp , int oldcolor , int newcolor )
00164 {
00165    int x , y ;
00166    if ( bmp ) {
00167       for ( x = 0 ; x < bmp -> w ; x ++ )
00168          for ( y = 0 ; y < bmp -> h ; y ++ )
00169             if ( getpixel( bmp , x , y ) == oldcolor )
00170                putpixel( bmp, x, y, newcolor );
00171    }

00176 /*!\fn ogl_blit( GLuint mytexture , int x , int y , int r , int g , int b , int alpha , int w , int h , int mode )
00177  *\brief Draw a given texture to the screen at position x,y and of size w,h

00190 void ogl_blit( GLuint mytexture , int x , int y , int r , int g , int b , int alpha , int w , int h , int mode )
00191 {
00192    if( mode == 1 )
00193    {
00194       glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, mytexture );
00195 
00196       glBegin( GL_QUADS );
00197       /*Draw our four points, clockwise.*/
00198       glColor4f( r, g, b, alpha );
00199       glTexCoord2f( 0, 1 );
00200       glVertex3f( x, y, 0 );
00201       glTexCoord2f( 1, 1 );
00202       glVertex3f( x + w, y, 0 );
00203       glTexCoord2f( 1, 0 );
00204       glVertex3f( x + w, y + h, 0 );
00205       glTexCoord2f( 0, 0 );
00206       glVertex3f( x, y + h , 0 );
00207       glEnd();
00208 
00209       /*binding the default texture*/
00210       glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0 );
00211    } 
00212    else
00213    {
00214       /* binding the texture */
00215       glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, mytexture );
00216 
00217       glEnable( GL_BLEND );
00218 
00219       glBegin( GL_QUADS );
00220       /*If we set the color to white here, then the textured quad won't be*/
00221       /*tinted red or half-see-through or something when we draw it based on*/
00222       /*the last call to glColor*().*/
00223       glColor3f( r, g, b );
00224 
00225       /*Draw our four points, clockwise.*/
00226       glTexCoord2f( 0, 1 );
00227       glVertex3f( x, y, 0 );
00228       glTexCoord2f( 1, 1 );
00229       glVertex3f( x + w, y, 0 );
00230       glTexCoord2f( 1, 0 );
00231       glVertex3f( x + w, y + h, 0 );
00232       glTexCoord2f( 0, 0 );
00233       glVertex3f( x, y + h , 0 );
00234       glEnd();
00235 
00236       glDisable( GL_BLEND );
00237 
00238

00240       glBindTexture( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0 );
